description: Thank you for your generosity! We offer several options to make giving easy and meaningful. Choose the one that fits your preference.
header: Give in the Way That Works Best for You

givingOptions.title: Donorbox (Online Giving)
givingOptions.description:
* Credit or Debit Card
* Apple Pay, Amazon Pay, Cash App
* Direct Bank Transfer

You can choose to cover the processing fee if you'd like.

givingOptions.title: Zelle (No Fees!)
givingOptions.description:
Send donations directly from your bank—fast and fee-free.

* Setup recurring transfers on your own schedule
* No processing fees

**Zelle to:** give@yourdomain.org

*Please note in memo: “Donation”*

givingOptions.title: By Check
givingOptions.description:
Mail your gift to:

P.O. Box 32, Odessa, DE 19730-0032

Make checks payable to: **International Missionary Fellowship**

givingOptions.title: PayPal
givingOptions.description:
Donate via credit card or linked bank account.

*Note: PayPal deducts a small processing fee from your donation.*
